Entry.Name: Default Scheme Http
Entry.Description: The application employs HttpHost, but it defaults to using the 'HTTP' scheme, which is represented by HttpHost.DEFAULT_SCHEME_NAME (HTTP). Utilizing plain HTTP poses a significant security risk because it leaves the data transmitted between the client and server vulnerable to interception and alteration by malicious actors.

Mitigation.Textual:
Please change Default Scheme Name to 'HTTPS'. Also consider to use HttpsURLConnection instead.
More information about remove support for the Apache HTTP client at this link.
